heading: Library Kiosk System
description: Created a collaborative Library Kiosk application utilizing object-oriented principles. Key features include managing the library catalog through classes like Book, Library, and Date. The Kiosk interface supports adding, removing, checking out/in books, and displaying the library's collection.

heading: Two-Player Chess Game
description: Developed a text-based Chess game for two players. Features include rendering the chessboard, legal move enforcement, castling, en passant, promotion, check/checkmate detection, and handling resignations and draw offers.

heading: Payroll Processing System
description: Engineered a Payroll Processing System for managing employee payments. Implemented comprehensive functionalities like adding/removing employees, calculating salaries, and generating paystubs using classes such as Employee, Fulltime, Parttime, Management, and Company.

heading: Music Database Design & Querying
description: Designed and implemented a relational database for a music streaming service using SQLite and SQL. The schema includes tables for artists, albums, songs, users, playlists, and ratings, ensuring minimal data redundancy and efficient querying.

heading: Kindergarten Classroom Simulation
description: Developed a classroom simulation using Singly Linked Lists, 2D arrays, and Circular Linked Lists. The simulation manages student entry, seating arrangements, and a musical chairs game, implementing fair seating logic based on availability and height order.

heading: Huffman Coding for Text Compression
description: Implemented a Huffman Coding algorithm in Java for efficient text compression, achieving up to 60% file size reduction. The project showcases algorithmic efficiency and accuracy, utilizing graph traversal algorithms (DFS and BFS) for exploration and analysis.

heading: Graph Algorithm Exploration (Infinity War)
description: Explored advanced graph algorithms and implemented an adjacency matrix in Java. The project includes seamless input/output operations and utilizes data structures like ArrayLists and HashMaps for efficient data management.
